audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - University of Michigan Men's Glee Club & University of Illinois Varsity Glee Club Combined Concert - 1956 November 10
audio_item.dc.contributor.author: University of Michigan. Men's Glee Club
audio_item.dc.rights.access: This material is available for research only in the Reading Room of the Bentley Historical Library at the University of Michigan (Ann Arbor, MI).
audio_item.dc.rights.copyright: This recording may be protected by copyright law. audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Program 10] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : Illinois Glee Club performs: The God Who Gave Us Life Gave Us Liberty, The Shepherdess, Die Minnesanger, Three Male Choruses, Little Thora, There Is No Folly Half So Great, Kvaalin's Halling, The Constant Cannibal Maiden,Tit for Tat, Pirate Song, Marry a Woman Uglier Than You, There is Nothing Like a Dame, Hail to the Orange, Hail To The Blue. Michigan Glee Club performs: Laudes Atque Carmina, Who is Sylvia, Fine Knacks for Ladies, The Heart Worships, Eileen, Lay Down Doggies, County Fair (Featuring the Novelaires) Selections by the Friars: Michigan Songs, The Bum Army; The Old Friars Songs; Goddess of the Inland Seas, Victors. Alma Maters: We're Loyal To You Illinois; The Yellow and Blue by Combined Glee Clubs.
